document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan & Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the Iranian Microgastrinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
East Azarbaijan (
Ghahari et al. 2010 c
).

Host records.
Hemileuca maia
(
Thompson 1944
;
Nixon 1974
;
Mason 1981
;
Peigler 1994
;
Ghahari et al. 2010 c
;
Yu et al. 2012
),
Liparis auriflura
,
Malacosoma americanum
,
M. disstrium
,
Olene basiflava
,
Orgyia leucostigma
,
Phyciodes nycteis
,
Pteronidia ribesii (
Shenefelt 1972
)
,
Lymantria dispar
,
L. monacha
,
Leucoma salicis
,
Euproctis chrysorrhoea
(
Shenefelt 1972
;
Yu et al. 2012
). In Europe, it has been bred from
Lymantria dispar
, while in England it has been bred from
Leucoma salicis
and
Orgyia antiqua
(
Nixon 1974
;
Yu et al. 2012
). In the USA ,
Orgyia leucostigma
has been reported as an occasional host for it (
Muesebeck and Dohanian 1927
;
Yu et al. 2012
).
Yu et al. ( 2012 )
reported the following hosts:
Abraxas grossulariata
,
Acrolyta nigricapitata
,
A. rufocincta
,
Acronicta psi
,
Aleiodes lymantriae
,
Anacampsis populella
,
Anastatus bifasciatus
,
A. japonicus
,
A. pearsalli
,
Arachnophaga picea
,
Baryscapus coerulescens
,
Catolaccus ater
,
Cirrospilus cinctithorax
,
C. coptodiscae
,
C. flavicinctus
,
C. marilandi
,
Compsilura concinnata
,
Conura debilis
,
C. meteori
,
C. side
,
C. torvina
,
Cyclophora linearia
,
C. punctaria
,
Dibrachys affinis
,
D. microgastri
,
Dimmockia incongrua
,
D. pallipes
,
Elasmus atratus
,
E. nudus
,
Encrateola laevigata
,
Erannis defoliaria
,
Eulithis testata
,
Eupelmus annulatus
,
E. urozonus
,
E. vesicularis
,
Eurytoma appendigaster
,
E. goidanichi
,
E. verticillata
,
Gelis agilis
,
G. apantelis
, G. a e r a t o r ,
G. cayennator
, G. c i n c t u s , G. c u s h m a n i ,
G. inutilis
,
G. nocuus
,
G. obscurus
,
G. tenellis
,
Haltichella xanticles
,
Horismenus microgaster
,
Hypopteromalus inimicus
,
H. tabacum
,
Ivela auripes
,
Lathronympha strigana
,
L. mathura
,
L. obfuscata
,
Lymeon orbus
,
Lysibia mandibularis
,
L. nana
,
Mesochorus discitergus
,
Macaria aemulataria
,
Malacosoma neustria
,
Mesochorus temporalis
,
M. uniformis
,
Mesopolobus
sp.,
Monodontomerus aereus
,
Noctua fimbriata
,
Nycteola asiatica
,
N. frigidana
,
Ooencyrtus kuvanae
,
Orthosia miniosa
,
O . stabilis
,
Ostrinia nubilalis
,
Pediobius cassidae
,
P. crassicornis
, P. p y rg o ,
Perilampus hyalinus
, P. negl ect us ,
Phigalia titea
,
Protapanteles flavicoxis
,
Pteromalus chrysos
,
P. microgastris
,
P. phycidis
,
Sympiesis sericeicornis
,

,

.
